summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East Fiftieth Street from Fourth Avenue Northeast to Tenth Avenue Northwest; Tenth Avenue Northeast from East Forty-seventh Street to Sylvester Place, and East Fifty-fifth Street from Ninth Avenue Northeast to Brooklyn Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, together with all necessary appurtenances for the proper surface drainage, of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 1968 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
